title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.5 - Issuance of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.5 - Issuance of license

State Regulations

The commission shall license as sales agents to sell
lottery tickets only such persons as in the opinion of the commission will best
serve public convenience consistent with the purposes of the
acts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5001.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
